QuestData.Title: Warchief's Command: Nagrand!
QuestData.Description:
All able-bodied members of the Horde are hereby ordered to report to Stone Guard Brox in Nagrand on Draenor.
Thrall is establishing a Horde outpost and needs help to stop the Warsong clan.
Speak with Bron Skyhorn to fly to Nagrand and meet up with the supply caravan.
For the Horde!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Stone Guard Brox in Nagrand on Draenor.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Stone Guard Brox in Nagrand on Draenor.
